name: darkest-lariat
caption: Darkest Lariat

effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  Damage calculation ignores the target's [stat modifiers]{mechanic:stat-modifiers}, including [evasion]{mechanic:evasion}.

flavorText:
The user swings both arms and hits the target.
The target’s stat changes don’t affect this
attack’s damage.
